<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sacred Armaments](/Feats.aspx?ID=3604) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Lastwall Sentry](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=15)

**Prerequisites**
[Lastwall Sentry Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=882)

</column>

---

Through the power of your faith or the blessing of a priest, your weapons are fully effective against incorporeal creatures. Weapons you wield have the effects of a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune for as long as you wield them.
